item.title: What is R? A 10 Part Series in the Journey into the Metaphysical Nature of Programming
item.description:
This week please complete the Introduction to R course on Data Camp which includes

  • Intro to basics
  • Vectors
  • Matrices
  • Factors
  • Data frames
  • Lists

item.title: Wait I Have to Clean my Room and my Data? Adulting is Hard.
item.description:
This week please complete both the Introduction to the Tidyverse and Exploratory Data Analysis in R courses on Data Camp which includes

  • Data wrangling
  • Data visualization
  • Grouping and summarizing
  • Types of visualizations
  • Exploring Categorical Data
  • Exploring Numerical Data
  • Numerical Summaries
  • Case Study (case study of email spam)

respectively.

item.title: Wrangling Data? That Sounds Like So Much Zzzzzzzz.....
item.description:
This week please complete both the Introduction to the Tidyverse and Exploratory Data Analysis in R courses on Data Camp which includes

  • Language of data
  • Study types and cautionary tales
  • Sampling strategies and experimental design
  • Case study (physical appearance of instructors and course evals)
  • Exploring Categorical Data
  • Exploring Numerical Data
  • Numerical Summaries
  • Case Study (case study of email spam)

respectively.

item.title: Pirates Cause Global Warming
item.description:
This week please complete both the Survey and Measurement Development in R and Correlation and Regression in R courses on Data Camp which includes

  • Preparing to analyze survey data

  • Exploratory factor analysis & survey development

  • Confirmatory factor analysis & construct validation

  • Criterion validity & replication

  • Visualizing two variables

  • Correlation

  • Simple linear regression

  • Interpreting regression models

  • Model Fit

While we have head the same saying that correlation \(\nRightarrow\) causation, it CAN imply it (with enough evidence!) Watch this visualization of the concept below.

Now please complete the Correlation and Regression in R courses on Data Camp which includes

  • Visualizing two variables
  • Correlation
  • Simple linear regression
  • Interpreting regression models
  • Model Fit
